ScrewFeeder
===========

.. currentmodule:: transport.continuous.solid

.. autoclass:: ScrewFeeder
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Overview
--------

The ``ScrewFeeder`` class provides analysis for screw conveyors and feeders used in controlled solid transport applications. This model incorporates screw geometry effects, volumetric and gravimetric feeding control, and power requirement calculations for precise material metering.

See Also
--------

* :doc:`PneumaticConveying` - Pneumatic solid transport
* :doc:`ConveyorBelt` - Mechanical belt conveying
* :doc:`GravityChute` - Gravity-driven transport
